column2: Residential burglary target selection: An analysis at the property-level using Google Street View

Land-area source: Municipality of The Hague — https://denhaag.incijfers.nl/

The paper does not report unit size directly. Land-area source: Northern Ireland Statistics & Research Agency — https://www.nisra.gov.uk/
